info.brief_description: Adventurer is rescued by a powerful woman and is now at her mercy (giantess, femdom, etc)
info.description:
A young male or female adventurer has just been defeated by a group of goblins. As they fade in and out of consciousness, they are suddenly rescued by a powerful female hero. However, the hero may find himself at the mercy of this woman.

Femdom is the primary theme of this work, though other fetishes that can be used include giantess, mini gts, futa, loli, smothering, maternal play and monster girls. Whether the hero is willing or eventually succumbs to them is up to you.

To help with structuring, each female hero will be categorised at the start based on a classic D&D class. Obviously people are encouraged to create their own girls. But to save time, here are some of the categories to get started.

Barbarian - Hulking towering force of strength. This woman could be an amazon, massive ssbbw or just a straight giantess.

Wizard - Smart characters with a talent for magic. They may use their magic in all kinds of ways such as shrinking the hero or changing their appearance.

Bard - Performance is their talent. Perhaps their songs brainwash the hero or their dancing is made a lot more fun with the hero trapped between their breasts.

Cleric - Believing they are the agents of gods, their divine power may be used to convert the hero by showing how wonderful or scary their god is.

Warlock - Beings who have devoted themselves to a powerful entity, these beings may be more monster than human as they subject the hero to their strange new gifts like a giant cock or tentacles.

In terms what not to write about - Keep the female rescuer in control
